rooms.description: Entryway with direct access to the main staircase leading to upper levels.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows and natural lighting.
Open space adjoining the dining area for formal meals and casual gatherings.
Modern kitchen with adequate cabinetry and ventilation, following local norms.
Mud room, utility area for storage of cleaning supplies and other essentials.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with south-west direction for positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample natural light and ventilation.
